import React, { useState, useEffect }from 'react'; import './Chat.css'; import axios from 'axios'; const urluser = "http://localhost:3001/api/user" const chatPost = "http://localhost:3001/api/chat" const chatGet = "http://localhost:3001/api/chat" const Chat = (props) => { const [user, setUser] = useState([]); const [chat, setChat] =useState({ text: "", }); const searchUser = async () => { await axios.get(urluser) .then(res => { const user = res.data; setUser({user}) }) } useEffect(() => { searchUser(); getChat() }, []) const handleChange = (e) => { const newData = {...chat}; newData[e.target.name] = e.target.value; setChat(newData) } const postChat = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post(chatPost, { text: chat.text }) } const getChat = () => { axios.get(chatGet) .then(res => { const chat = res.data setChat(chat) }) } return (
New Chat
    {user.user.user.map(user =>
  • {user.displayName} {user.singupDate.substring(11,16)}

    {user.description}

    • )}
  • Load More Messages
{postChat(e)}}>
); } export default Chat;
